thread.title: Shivarajkumar out of hospital
thread.title_full: Shivarajkumar out of hospital - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Shivarajkumar out of hospital
text:
Hattrick Hero Shivarajkumar has been discharged from Mallya Hospital and will now be resting at home. The actor has been in hospital since Tuesday morning following complaints of chest pain.
The actor's wife, Geetha Shivarajkumar, was by her husband's side throughout and accompanied him from the hospital to their Hebbal home. The actor will be resting at home till he recuperates before shooting for his upcoming projects. Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
